item.title: Adding a Keypress
item.description: Key Press Jump canvas{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,-50%); } console.log("Yo!") function setup() { robot = createSprite(150,150,50,160); robot.addAnimation("idle", "../images/Idle01.png", "../images/Idle09.png"); robot.addAnimation("run", "../images/Run01.png", "../images/Run08.png"); createCanvas(800, 300); } function draw() { background('black'); if(keyIsDown(39)){ console.log("ddddd") robot.changeAnimation("run"); robot.velocity.x = 1; } else if(!keyIsDown(39)) { robot.changeAnimation("idle"); robot.velocity.x = 0; } drawSprites(); }

item.title: Moving Our Sprite
item.description: Key Press Move canvas{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,-50%); } var robot; function setup() { robot = createSprite(150,150,50,160); robot.addAnimation("idle", "../images/Idle01.png", "../images/Idle09.png"); robot.addAnimation("run", "../images/Run01.png", "../images/Run08.png"); createCanvas(800, 300); } function draw() { background('black'); if (keyIsDown(39)) { robot.velocity.x = 1; robot.changeAnimation('run'); } else{ robot.velocity.x = 0; robot.changeAnimation('idle'); } drawSprites(); }

item.title: Moving Our Sprite 2
item.description: Key Press Move 2 canvas{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,-50%); } var robot; function setup() { robot = createSprite(150,150,50,160); robot.addAnimation("idle", "../images/Idle01.png", "../images/Idle09.png"); robot.addAnimation("run", "../images/Run01.png", "../images/Run08.png"); createCanvas(800, 300); } function draw() { background('black'); if (keyIsDown(39)) { robot.velocity.x = 1; robot.changeAnimation('run'); robot.mirrorX(1); } else if (keyIsDown(37)) { robot.velocity.x = -1; robot.changeAnimation('run'); robot.mirrorX(-1); } else{ robot.velocity.x = 0; robot.changeAnimation('idle'); } drawSprites(); }

item.title: Moving the Circle
item.description: Move the Circle canvas{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,-50%); } var x = 100; var y = 100; function setup() { createCanvas(800, 300); } function draw() { if (keyIsDown(LEFT_ARROW)) { x -= 5; } if (keyIsDown(RIGHT_ARROW)) { x += 5; } if (keyIsDown(UP_ARROW)) { y -= 5; } if (keyIsDown(DOWN_ARROW)) { y += 5; } background('black'); ellipse(x, y, 50, 50); }
